target_name: Eliminate all forms of violence against all women and girls in the public and private spheres, including trafficking and sexual and other types of exploitation
computation_definitions:
National data (Type1)
This is the national produced statistics in the ROK that best corresponds to the definition of UN SDGs indicators.
Download the national metadata file for more information.
indicator_name: Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
data_name: Proportion of people who have experienced sexual violence in the previous 12 months
indicator_definition: The proportion of people who have experienced sexual violence in the previous 12 months. Types of sexual violence include sexual assault, attempted rape, rape, obscene phone calls, illegal filming, dissemination of obscene material, indecent exposure, and sexual harrassment.
computation_calculations: Interviews with 10,000 males and females aged 19-64
global_indicator_name: Proportion of women and girls aged 15 years and older subjected to sexual violence by persons other than an intimate partner in the previous 12 months, by age and place of occurrence
graph_title: Proportion of people who have experienced sexual violence in the previous 12 months
source_organisation_1: Women’s and Youth Rights Support Division, Women’s and Youth Rights Promotion Bureau, Ministry of Gender Equality and Family
